```{r}
CSVLink='https://github.com/RSGriggs/543_proj/raw/main/ChildrenLanguageAtHome.csv'

CSVData=read.csv(CSVLink)
```
```{r}
str(CSVData)
```

```{r}
MapFile='https://github.com/RSGriggs/543_proj/raw/main/gz_2010_us_040_00_5m.json'
library(sf)
```
```{r}
WorldMap=read_sf(MapFile)
```
```{r}
str(WorldMap)
```

```{r}
WorldMapVars=merge(WorldMap,
                   CSVData, 
                   by='NAME')
```
```{r}
library(ggplot2)

B1=ggplot(data=WorldMap) + geom_sf(fill='grey90',
                                     color=NA) + theme_classic()

B1
```
```{r}
FillMap= B1 + geom_sf(data=WorldMapVars,
                       aes(fill=Data),
                       color=NA)
FillMap
```
